summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        Your task: Provide a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image, focusing on its relevance to gameplay. 
        Describe key visual elements such as characters, enemies, UI components (e.g., health bars, icons), environments, or any text hints present. 
        Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game where a character, equipped with a staff, is standing in a snowy environment and facing a powerful enemy attack. The attack is visually represented by a large, bright energy beam or wave emanating from the enemy, creating a dramatic visual effect. The character appears to be preparing to counter or defend against this attack. The user interface (UI) shows several hexagonal icons on the left and right sides, likely representing abilities or items available to the player. At the bottom of the screen, there is a health bar and other status indicators. The text "Cyan Loong" is displayed, possibly indicating the name of the enemy or the current mission objective.
